name: Super Dungeon puzzle crawler Ultimate Ex
name_original: Super Dungeon puzzle crawler Ultimate Ex
description:
A tiny puzzle game for theBlackthornprod gamejam #3, with the topic " less is more".

In this game, you try to kill the evil mage lich, but a there are some monsters and dungeon in your way, but be careful, any monster you kill, will grant more power to the lich !

You must find the linch with the fewer movements and tries on the puzzle, and kill less enemies you can, or the lich will be so powerful that nobody could kill him.

Enjoy this little game.

Credits:       

 Tilemap background: https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack
 Monsters, player and tiles : https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
 Sounds: Voices_Sound_Effect_Library( can't find original post ;( )
